item.title: Cli
item.description: Cli source: official docs Basic yarn add: adds a package to use in your current package. yarn init: initializes the development of a package. yarn install: installs all the dependencies defined in a package.json file. yarn publish: publishes a package to a package manager. yarn remove: removes an unused package from your current package.
